title: Mission and Vision
text: Ato Music Management is a management and consulting company with the core objective of empowering up and coming artists. We are here to help our artists understand in which direction they want to pursue their careers and become commercially successful. Our company has a strong international focus which allows us to guide the artists on different markets considering the cultural differences that each region can have.

title: Management
text: AMM is providing a full career management service allowing the artists to focus mostly on their music. We are taking care of making you work with the right people, that suits your vision of the music industry and career development.

title: Consulting
text: Our consulting service is suited for artists already working with a management team. We will provide consultancy on your career development plan, marketing strategy, audience development strategy etcâ€¦
